trans-unit.source: Defines evidence that represents permission requests.
trans-unit.target: 定义表示权限请求的证据。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Permission requests include the minimum permissions the code requires to run, permissions the code can use if they are granted, but are not required, and permissions the code explicitly asks not to be granted.
trans-unit.target: 权限请求包括所需的最低代码运行，则代码可以使用它们在授予的权限所需的权限但不是必需的和代码显式请求权限不才能被授予。

trans-unit.source: The minimum permissions the code requires to run.
trans-unit.target: 代码运行所需的最小权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissions the code can use if they are granted, but that are not required.
trans-unit.target: （如果授予）代码可以使用的（但不是必需的）权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissions the code explicitly asks not to be granted.
trans-unit.target: 代码明确请求不要授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" /> class with the permission request of a code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 用代码程序集的权限请求初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework security policy system uses the requested permissions along with a code assembly's <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> to determine which permissions the code should be granted.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全策略系统使用以及代码程序集的请求的权限<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>以确定代码应授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 创建作为当前实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 作为此实例副本的新对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" /> 的等效副本。

trans-unit.source: An equivalent copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" /> 的等效副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the permissions the code explicitly asks not to be granted.
trans-unit.target: 获取代码明确请求不要授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissions the code explicitly asks not to be granted.
trans-unit.target: 代码明确请求不要授予的权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the permissions the code can use if they are granted, but are not required.
trans-unit.target: 获取（如果授予）代码可以使用的（但不是必需的）权限。

trans-unit.source: The permissions the code can use if they are granted, but are not required.
trans-unit.target: （如果授予）代码可以使用的（但不是必需的）权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum permissions the code requires to run.
trans-unit.target: 获取代码运行所需的最小权限。

trans-unit.source: The minimum permissions the code requires to run.
trans-unit.target: 代码运行所需的最小权限。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" /> 状态的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence" /> 状态的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful during debugging to get an easy-to-read representation of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence>.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的易于理解表示形式在调试期间，此方法很有用<xref:System.Security.Policy.PermissionRequestEvidence>。
